ModMetaData.name: RimBees - Genetic Rim Patch
ModMetaData.author: Sarg
ModMetaData.description:
Extract DNA from animals and hybridize them to create new, exotic species!
<size=24>Features</size> - Adds eleven hybrids between vanilla creatures and bees from RimBees! - Adds twelve new bee species that generate materials for Genetic Rim, as well as the reserach to discover new combinations! - Adds a new building, the Bee genepod, to mix genes from bees and create your hybrids. - Adds new wax, new honey and twelve new honeycombs
<size=24>Load Order</size> - As with all patch mods, be sure to call it after RimBees mod and GeneticRim mod, or else you'll get some errors.
<size=24>Compatibility</size> Compatible with A Dog Said Should be savegame compatible and not break anything. Should!
<size=24>Credit</size> Bee sounds by Odilonmarcenaro https://freesound.org/people/odilonmarcenaro/sounds/239909/
<size=24>Changelog</size> v1.0: Release (20/11/19)
